thread.title: Partizan Belgrade manager demands Everton Luiz be punished for reacting to racist chants that made him leave pitch in tears
thread.title_full: Partizan Belgrade manager demands Everton Luiz be punished for reacting to racist chants that made him leave pitch in tears

author: smorgan
title: Partizan Belgrade manager demands Everton Luiz be punished for reacting to racist chants that made him leave pitch in tears
text:
EFL 'Both sides to be punished' Partizan Belgrade manager demands Everton Luiz be punished for reacting to racist chants that made him leave pitch in tears 
Marko Nikolic, who had previously called one of his own players a 'black idiot', says Luiz made obscene gesture after copping abuse By Sam Morgan
